CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Estimated_Date_of_Birth__c)), TEXT(FLOOR(( (zToday__c - Estimated_Date_of_Birth__c) / 365))) &' Years' & ' ' & TEXT(FLOOR( (MOD( (zToday__c - Estimated_Date_of_Birth__c),365)/30))) &' Months', IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Animal_Age__c)) && NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Animal_Age_Units__c))), IF(TEXT(Animal_Age_Units__c) = 'Days', TEXT(FLOOR(( (zToday__c - (Animal_Age_Units_Changed_Date__c - Animal_Age__c))/365))) &' Years' & ' ' & TEXT(FLOOR((MOD( (zToday__c - (Animal_Age_Units_Changed_Date__c - Animal_Age__c)),365)/30))) &' Months', IF(TEXT(Animal_Age_Units__c) = 'Weeks', TEXT(FLOOR(( (zToday__c - (Animal_Age_Units_Changed_Date__c - ( 7* Animal_Age__c)))/365))) &' Years' & ' ' & TEXT(FLOOR((MOD( (zToday__c - (Animal_Age_Units_Changed_Date__c - ( 7* Animal_Age__c))),365)/30))) &' Months' , IF(TEXT(Animal_Age_Units__c) = 'Months', IF(OR( Animal_Age__c = 2 && OR(MONTH(Animal_Age_Units_Changed_Date__c) = 4, MONTH(Animal_Age_Units_Changed_Date__c) = 3), Animal_Age__c = 1 && MONTH(Animal_Age_Units_Changed_Date__c) = 3, Animal_Age__c = 3 && MONTH(Animal_Age_Units_Changed_Date__c) = 5 ), TEXT(FLOOR((zToday__c - ADDMONTHS(Animal_Age_Units_Changed_Date__c, -1 * Animal_Age__c))/365)) &' Years' & ' ' & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((zToday__c - (ADDMONTHS(Animal_Age_Units_Changed_Date__c, -1 * Animal_Age__c))),365)/30) + 1) &' Months', TEXT(FLOOR((TODAY() - ADDMONTHS(Animal_Age_Units_Changed_Date__c, -1 * Animal_Age__c))/365)) &' Years' & ' ' & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((zToday__c - (ADDMONTHS(Animal_Age_Units_Changed_Date__c, -1 * Animal_Age__c))),365)/30)) &' Months'), IF(TEXT(Animal_Age_Units__c) = 'Years', TEXT(FLOOR(((zToday__c - (ADDMONTHS(Animal_Age_Units_Changed_Date__c, -12 * Animal_Age__c)))/365))) &' Years' & ' ' & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((zToday__c - (ADDMONTHS(Animal_Age_Units_Changed_Date__c, -12 * Animal_Age__c))),365) / 30)) &' Months', "")))) , "") )
CustomField.label: Current Animal Age
